| HistoryText             = 3 Scientists who experimented on themselves, they gained the ability to control all of their molecules to change shape and resist attack{{r|Marvel Comics Presents Vol 1 126}}. 

While fleeing they were pursued by FBI agent Patty Kurlyshek, who allied with the New Mutant Warlock in the hope of recapturing them. They were defeated when Warlock threw them into a tar pit and blew hard enough for the tar to dry and lock them.

They were employed by Imus Champion to kill the Peregrine, along with Wolverine and the Courier{{r|Marvel Comics Presents Vol 1 125}}. After being knocked out by the Black Widow, the Peregrine, Wolverine and the Courier used them as disguises{{r|Marvel Comics Presents Vol 1 126}}.
